A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A great film especially with repeated views. Clever and well thought out on so many levels. Rian Johnson has moved the Star Wars universe on and provided surprises along the way. Gone are the predictable boss level set pieces; replaced with a fresh look at the Force and how it permeates everything in the Star Wars universe. Some questions are answered\, but there’s much to mull over until episode 9. Looking forward to to the Blu-ray and the reported masses of full scenes which were not added to the final cut. I don’t understand the negative comments and placing it as the worst Star Wars film behind the prequels is inconceivable. Although I can see people’s opinion changing when Ep9 comes out and the story is complete.
